description: Design and implement advanced LLM-based workflows for customer-care automation using state-of-the-art models (Qwen, Llama, Gemma, etc.). Build agentic AI pipelines with tool calling, RAG, embeddings, ReAct planning, and safety/guardrail enforcement to ensure factual, policy-compliant outputs.
Deploy and optimize large-scale AI models on specialized GPU clusters (NVIDIA H100, L40S) with vLLM and LlamaCPP.
Contribute to full-stack software development, from frontends (React/TypeScript) and backends (NestJS, FastAPI) to AI microservices (Websockets, Python SDKs).
Manage data infrastructure (Postgres, MongoDB, Qdrant) for knowledge-base orchestration and retrieval.
Maintain CI/CD pipelines (GitLab, Docker) and perform Linux sysadmin/network tasks across dev, pre-prod, and prod environments.
Gained expertise in transformer models (LLMs, Embeddings), dataset design, and fine-tuning (SFT, DPO, LORA).
Deployed AI workloads on HPC infrastructures (Nvidia H100 clusters) using Docker, Nvidia NGC, and Slurm.
Developed OCR systems with DepthAI/Raspberry Pi and object detection models with OpenCV/YOLOv8 for Real-Time screen monitoring.
Led the complete, from-scratch redesign and development of the corporate website.
Developed tailored web solutions for major events like Vivatech and JDL Expo 2022.
Co-developed an intelligent system to combat driver fatigue for long-haul truck drivers.
Awarded 2nd Place Jury Prize at the Start'up Competition in Chicago.
Designed a solution aligned with UN 2030 Sustainable Development Goals.

education.description: Software Engineering, Distributed Systems, Machine Learning
Graduated with honors. Specialized in software development and interactive systems.

certifications.title: Learning AI Through Visualization
certifications.description: This course offers a comprehensive introduction to Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML), and Deep Learning (DL) with a focus on practical applications, guiding learners through structured modules that cover foundational concepts from datasets to AI model implementation, optimization techniques, linear regression, and deep learning, while emphasizing real-world problem-solving with low-code/no-code hands-on exercises and interactive dashboards to solidify theory and enable AI-driven solution development, tailored for working professionals from entry to mid-career individuals, senior managers, and corporate executives seeking to transition into AI, particularly those aspiring to become "AI Chefs" equipped with the knowledge and skills to integrate AI into operations, enhance decision-making, and drive innovation in their organizations.

certifications.title: Backend Development and APIs
certifications.description: The Back End Development and APIs Certification covers building server-side applications with Node.js and npm, developing web apps using the Express framework, and implementing microservices with MongoDB and Mongoose, providing practical experience in modular back end architecture and API-driven development.

certifications.title: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
certifications.description: The JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures Certification provides comprehensive training in JavaScript fundamentals-including variables, arrays, objects, loops, functions, and the DOM-while covering Object-Oriented and Functional Programming, algorithmic problem-solving, data persistence with local storage, and API data fetching, equipping learners with the skills to build interactive, dynamic web applications.
